__e: Then I was like, "Wait, was that Rogers and 355 or Ransom?" - And then...
My name is Robert Rogers and I don't aim to be here all night.
So, then he sits down and takes off his shoes like Mr. Rogers, and he goes...
I give you my word, I won't go back to my ranch until your Colonel Rogers has cleared out.
I never killed Rogers and I ain't got your key or your sodding gun!
Remember, Mr. Rogers, do not sit unless he does, address him as "Your Majesty," and do not speak unless he addresses you.
